projects.title: Multi-Language Filter Compilation
projects.description: Choose from four different implementations: TypeScript/Node.js with Deno support, .NET 8 with library and CLI, Python 3.9+ with pip distribution, or Rust with high-performance single binary. All support the same configuration schema with JSON, YAML, and TOML formats.

projects.title: Complete C# SDK for AdGuard DNS
projects.description: Auto-generated from OpenAPI specification with full async/await support, Polly resilience policies, dependency injection with ILogger support, and fluent configuration helpers. Includes interactive Spectre.Console UI for device management, DNS server operations, statistics, and query logs.

projects.title: PowerShell & Shell Scripts
projects.description: Cross-platform PowerShell modules with exported functions for compilation pipelines, interactive harness with menu-driven interface, and Pester tests. Also includes Bash scripts for Linux/macOS, PowerShell Core scripts, and Windows batch files for maximum compatibility.

projects.title: Pre-configured Development Container
projects.description: Dockerfile with .NET 8.0 SDK, Node.js 20.x LTS, PowerShell 7, and Git pre-installed. Available as jaysonknight/warp-env:ad-blocking for instant development environment setup. Perfect for CI/CD or local development without dependency installation hassles.
